stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in Long Beach
stateCompliance.content: Los Angeles County residents, including Long Beach, are protected by California's strict consumer lending regulations.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (460% APR typical)
Only one loan allowed at a time - no rollovers
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and regulated
One $15 NSF fee maximum per bounced check
Disclosures required in your preferred language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes. California cash advance laws may change. For current information, call the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. For legal questions, consult a California attorney.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Long Beach Area Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Need a location closer to you? We serve these nearby Long Beach communities:

faq.question: Where is your Long Beach location?
faq.answer: We're at 678 Pacific Avenue, Suite 210, right across from the Queen Mary Museum in Long Beach. Take I-405 or I-710 to Exit 45 toward Pacific Avenue. Easy waterfront parking available.

faq.question: Can I get approved same-day in Long Beach?
faq.answer: Yes! Bring your valid ID, recent pay stubs or proof of income, and checking account information. Most customers are approved and funded same day.

faq.question: What's the maximum I can borrow?
faq.answer: California law limits loans to $300 including all fees. With the standard 15% fee, you can typically borrow up to $255 in cash.

faq.question: How much will your fees be?
faq.answer: California caps fees at 15% of the check amount. For a $200 loan, fees are $30. For $255, the maximum fee is $45.

faq.question: Is Lion Cash Advance licensed in California?
faq.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation. Verify our license at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
